lead_paragraph: New Zealand centre Ryan Crotty has recovered from a head injury and returns to the All Blacks team to face fast-improving Argentina in the Rugby Championship on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Crotty Returns as All Blacks Name Settled Side to Face Pumas
headline.main: Crotty Returns as All Blacks Name Settled Side to Face Pumas

snippet: New Zealand centre Ryan Crotty has recovered from a head injury and returns to the All Blacks team to face fast-improving Argentina in the Rugby Championship on Saturday....
